segments.text: Alright , Mom . Should I turn off the TV right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , honey . Go to your room , and take out your book . It's your reading time now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , where is the remote ? I can't find it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just go to read . I will find it , honey .
segments.speaker: S2
